short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses AI to identify and emphasize informative sentences on webpages, helping you focus on key details and enhance your reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xoFocus uses an AI language model (LLM) to identify and emphasize the most informative sentences on webpages, enhancing your reading experience with dynamic, animated highlights that guide your attention to key information.

Navigate efficiently between key sentences using the Return and Shift keys instead of scrolling.

Conceptualized, researched, designed, and built by Kamron Saniee. xofocus.net
